sys_script.name: Populate IP Address City

sys_update_version.name: sys_script_6b689cf02f7830108b5cdc1a2799b6c8
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>true</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>true</action_update><active>true</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>x_648110_iplookup_ipaddressinfo</collection><condition/><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition/><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>Populate IP Address City</name><order>100</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/) {

	// Add your code here
	try { 
		var r = new sn_ws.RESTMessageV2('x_648110_iplookup.IPInfo', 'GetIPInfo');
		gs.info(JSON.stringify(r));
		
		r.setStringParameterNoEscape('specific_field', 'geo');
		r.setStringParameterNoEscape('ipaddress', 'current.ip_address');

		//override authentication profile 
		//authentication type ='basic'/ 'oauth2'
		//r.setAuthenticationProfile(authentication type, profile name);

		//set a MID server name if one wants to run the message on MID
		//r.setMIDServer('MY_MID_SERVER');

		//if the message is configured to communicate through ECC queue, either
		//by setting a MID server or calling executeAsync, one needs to set skip_sensor
		//to true. Otherwise, one may get an intermittent error that the response body is null
		//r.setEccParameter('skip_sensor', true);

		var response = r.execute();
		var responseBody = response.getBody();
		var httpStatus = response.getStatusCode();
		gs.info("httpStatus: " + httpStatus);
		
		// Convert json formatted string to javascript object
		var responseObj = JSON.parse(responseBody);
		gs.info("responseObj.city = " + responseObj.city);
		// Set value of the City field on the IPAddressInfo record
		current.city = responseObj.city;
		gs.info("City = " + current.city);
		current.update();
		
	}
	catch(ex) {
		var message = ex.message;
		gs.info("uncaught error: " + ex);
	}
})(current, previous);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2021-06-14 16:01:58</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>6b689cf02f7830108b5cdc1a2799b6c8</sys_id><sys_mod_count>13</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Populate IP Address City</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="IPLookup" source="x_648110_iplookup">3162107c2f3830108b5cdc1a2799b6cf</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="IPLookup">3162107c2f3830108b5cdc1a2799b6cf</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_6b689cf02f7830108b5cdc1a2799b6c8</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2021-06-14 16:40:03</sys_updated_on><template/><when>async</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=6b689cf02f7830108b5cdc1a2799b6c8"/></record_update>
